And I will not prove it because some body possibly is younger as in a newer generation I am sorry as I do not work that way /, they need to find out themselves and if they do not it means they are not looking sincerely. We need to personally pump our brains like working at a gym like muscles .Just be truly sincere as best or better and observe things very closely/ There is a reason people knew truth being absolute were actually that.
